A lost and hungry goldfish embarks on an adventure to find food, only to discover that it likes the taste of tree leaves.
A goldfish is inspired by a painting to climb trees and becomes an unlikely artist, painting the colorful leaves with his fins.
A goldfish gets stuck in a tree and is rescued by a kind squirrel, who tries to help it climb back to the water.
A group of goldfish accidentally falls into a tree and creates a home for themselves, living in the branches and swimming in small pools formed by the leaves.
A goldfish has a mission to climb the tallest tree in the forest, using its fins to hold on and its tail to propel itself upwards.
